isp_info.isp_address: Igama lomgwaqo 10, idolobha nekhowudi yeposi, njll.

inputUsername_placeholder: -- Lapho ufaka i-Login qaphela izinhlamvu ezinkulu/ezincane --
inputPassword_placeholder: -- Lapho ufaka iphasiwedi qaphela izinhlamvu ezinkulu/ezincane --
anon_pretext1: Ukuze idivayisi yakho ingene futhi ithole ukufinyelela ku-inthanethi, chofoza Ngena. Ukuxhumana kuzohlala amahora angu-12 uma idivayisi ingasebenzi.
status_pretext1: Idivayisi yakho isifakwe futhi ithole ukufinyelela ku-inthanethi. Ukuxhumana kuzohlala isikhathi esinqunyiwe ngabaphathi benethiwekhi ngokwesikhathi sokusebenza kwedivayisi.
status_pretext2: Uma ufuna ukuqeda lokhu uxhumano ngokwakho, chofoza PHUMA.
noscript: Isexwayiso: Ukuze ungene kuhlelo ngendlela efanele, i-JavaScript kufanele ivuliwe kubrawuza yakho.
cp_portal_info: Ukufinyelela ku-inthanethi kunethiwekhi ye-<Igama le-ISP> kudinga i-login nephasiwedi. Qiniseka ukuthi i-login nephasiwedi kugcinwa kuyimfihlo futhi kuvikelwe ekulahlekelweni noma ukufinyelelwa ngabanye.
cp_portal_cookies_note: Uhlelo lokungena lomsebenzisi lusebenzisa ama-cookies ukugcina imininingwane kukhompyutha yakho. Ama-cookies asetshenziselwa ukuhlinzeka ngezinsiza ezisezingeni eliphezulu, kuhlanganise nokwenza ngendlela efanele ngokwezidingo zomsebenzisi. Ukusebenzisa i-portal yokungena ngaphandle kokushintsha izilungiselelo zama-cookies kusho ukuthi azofakwa kudivayisi yakho.
cp_session_timeout_content:
Isikhathi sokufinyelela ku-inthanethi siphelile, ngakho-ke uxhumano luphelile.
Ungakwenza kanjani?
  • Ukuze uqhubeke nokusebenzisa i-inthanethi, hlola ithuba lokwelula ukufinyelela noma ukuthenga isikhathi esengeziwe.
  • Uma unemibuzo, xhumana nosizo lobuchwepheshe.
cp_error_info:
• I-login noma iphasiwedi engalungile isetshenzisiwe
  • Caps Lock ivuliwe
  • Elinye ikhompyutha lingene ku-akhawunti yakho
  • I-akhawunti yakho ivinjiwe uhlelo ngenxa yokusebenza okungalungile kwedivayisi yakho
  • I-akhawunti isiphelile noma isusiwe ngenxa yokungakhokhi imali yesondlo
cp_error_solution_title: Zama ukuxazulula inkinga ngokulandela izincomo ezingezansi:
cp_error_solution:
• Bheka ukuthi ufake kahle i-login nephasiwedi (qaphela izinhlamvu ezinkulu/ezincane)
  • Bheka ukuthi i-akhawunti yakho ikhokhelwe
  • Uma inkinga ingahambisani nezixazululo ezingezansi, xhumana nosizo lwe-inethiwekhi
cp_rules_content:
1. Imigomo ibhalwe ku-HTML ejwayelekile

  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin nibh augue, suscipit a, scelerisque sed, lacinia in, mi. Cras vel lorem. Etiam pellentesque aliquet tellus. Phasellus pharetra nulla ac diam. Quisque semper justo at risus. Donec venenatis, turpis vel hendrerit interdum, dui ligula ultricies purus, sed posuere libero dui id orci. Nam congue, pede vitae dapibus aliquet, elit magna vulputate arcu, vel tempus metus leo non est. Etiam sit amet lectus quis est congue mollis. Phasellus congue lacus eget neque. cp_login_attempt_content: Uhlelo luvumela ukuphinda uzame ukufaka kabi %s izikhathi. Ngemva kokudlula inani, ukufinyelela kuzovinjwa imizuzu %s %s.
a11y-keys_data-content:
Inhlanganisela yezinkinobho
⇧ Shift (kwesobunxele)
+ ⌥ Alt (kwesobunxele)
+ uhlamvu

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + U
ugxilise esigabeni Igama lomsebenzisi

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + P
ugxilise esigabeni Iphasiwedi

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + A
khetha/ukukhipha ukukhetha ibhokisi "Ngiyavuma imigomo"

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + R
ivula iwindi lemodali lemigomo

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + I
ngena ngemvume yomsebenzisi

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + O
phuma ngemvume yomsebenzisi

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + L
qalisa ukushintsha ulimi

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + M
ivula imenyu ye-offcanvas (uma ivuliwe)
a11y-lang-keys_data-content:
Bamba ⇧ Shift (kwesobunxele) bese ucindezela izinhlamvu ezimbili zekhowudi yolimi (ISO 639-1) ngasikhathi sinye noma ngokulandelana.

Izibonelo:
⇧ Shift + P + L → shintsha isiPolish (pl)

⇧ Shift + E + N → shintsha isiNgisi (en)

⇧ Shift + D + E → shintsha isiJalimane (de)

⇧ Shift + F + R → shintsha isiFulentshi (fr)

⇧ Shift + E + S → shintsha isiSpanish (es)

⇧ Shift + I + T → shintsha isiNtaliyane (it)
...
polyglotLanguageSwitcher_data-content: Lapha ungashintsha inguqulo yolimi lwephothali. Cindezela %s ekhibhodi ukuze uvule %s noma Shift bese ucindezela izinhlamvu ezimbili zekhowudi yolimi ngasikhathi sinye noma ngokulandelana, isb: Shift + P + L ukushintsha kolimi olifunwayo.
fieldUsername_data-content: Le ngxenye iqukethe isiqhiye sokufinyelela. Cindezela ngasikhathi sinye %s ekhibhodi ukukhetha %s.
fieldPassword_data-content: Le ngxenye iqukethe isiqhiye sokufinyelela. Cindezela ngasikhathi sinye %s ekhibhodi ukukhetha %s.
login-rules_data-content: Lapha uqinisekisa imigomo yokusebenzisa isevisi ye-Internet ngokuvumelana nemigomo.
cp_portal_event_undefined_data-content: Lapha uzothola ulwazi ngoxhumano lwesixhobo sakho.
logoff_data-content: Chofoza inkinobho Phuma ukuze uqede uxhumano lwe-Internet.
menuTrigger_data-content: Uchofoza ku ☰ offcanvas hamburger noma ucindezela ngokuhlanganyela %s kukhibhodi ukuvula imenyu yomongo.
about_content:
GuardianSuit iyi-template yesimanje, ephendulayo futhi enezithombe ezihambayo ye-Captive Portal ye-OPNsense. Inikeza abasebenzisi isipiliyoni esihehayo sokungena, kanti abaphathi banokulawula ngokuphelele ukubukeka nokusebenza kwekhasi lokwamukela.

Izici Eziyinhloko:

  • Ukuphendula nokuhamba kwezithombe.
  • Ukusekela izilimi eziningi.
  • Ukulungiselela okulula kokubukeka nombala.
  • UX esobala nokuhambisana ne-WCAG.
  • Ukuhlanganiswa okulula ne-OPNsense.

Ukusetshenziswa:
Kufanelekile kuma-network ezinkampani, amahhotela, izindawo zokudlela, nezinye izindawo ezidinga ikhasi lokwamukela elihehayo le-Captive Portal.

Umbhali: Mirosław Majka <mix@proask.pl> | © 2025 GuardianSuit
cookies_content:
Iyini i-cookie?

Amafayela e-cookies (aziwa nangokuthi ama-cookies) ayizifayela ezincane zombhalo, ezenziwa ngokuzenzakalelayo isiphequluli sewebhu lapho uvakashela amakhasi e-WWW. Ulwazi olusefayeleni le-cookie lungafundwa kuphela yikhasi lewebhu elikhiqize lona. Ngakho-ke, ikhasi lewebhu alikwazi ukufinyelela kwamanye amafayela akhompyutheni yakho.

Ngo-ulwazi olusemafayeleni e-cookies, ikhasi lewebhu "liyazi" indlela olisebenzisela ngayo futhi lingalungisa ngokuya ngokufanele okuqukethwe okukuboniswa noma likunikeze usizo.

Kungani sisebenzisa amafayela e-cookies?

Ekhasini sisebenzisa amafayela e-cookies wezobuchwepheshe, adingekayo ukuze ikhasi lisebenze kahle. Sisebenzisa lawa amafayela ukulungisa ikhasi lethu lewebhu ngokuya ngamadivayisi neziphequluli abantu abavame ukuvakashela ngazo – ngaleyo ndlela ikhompyutha yakho, ithebhulethi noma ucingo luzokubonisa kahle futhi ngokuqondile, futhi lukugcina ukuthi uyavuma yini ukuboniswa kokuqukethwe okukhethiwe ekhasini.

Umsebenzisi akakwazi ukwenqaba amafayela e-cookies wezobuchwepheshe.

Singawasebenzisa isikhathi esingakanani amafayela e-cookies?

Sisebenzisa amafayela e-cookie aqinile, ahlala kudivayisi yakho isikhathi esinqunyiwe noma kuze kube yilapho uwasusa ngesandla.

Yimiphi imininingwane eqoqwa ngama-cookies?

Ngobuchwepheshe be-cookie siqoqa kuphela imininingwane yobuchwepheshe engaziwa ngawe, esetshenziselwa ukuthuthukisa ukuhlangabezana kahle kwewebhusayithi yethu.

Asiqoqi lutho olunikezela ngokukwazi ukukuhlonza. Ulwazi olulodwa ngomsebenzisi, olungavumi ukubonwa ngaphandle kokuhlanganiswa nolunye ulwazi, yilona ikheli le-IP olisebenzisela ukufinyelela ekhasini.
privacy_content:
Sakha lo mbhalo ukuze sikwazise ngeNqubomgomo yethu yobumfihlo. Lapha uzofunda ukuthi singobani, indlela esiqoqa ngayo, esisebenzisa ngayo, esivezayo futhi esabelana ngayo ngemininingwane yomuntu siqu ngaphansi kwe- < Igama le-ISP >, enekheli le-[Igama lomgwaqo 10, idolobha nekhowudi yeposi, njll.], ngenhloso yethu nokuthi abantu idatha yabo icutshungulwa kanjani bangasebenzisa kanjani amalungelo abo obumfihlo.

< Igama le-ISP > inesibopho sokucubungula idatha yomuntu siqu ngokuhambisana nale Nqubomgomo yobumfihlo.

MAYELANA NATHI

Umphathi, okuwumuntu ocubungula idatha yomuntu siqu uma usebenzisa le nsiza, ngu < Igama le-ISP >, [Igama lomgwaqo 10, idolobha nekhowudi yeposi, njll.]; NIP 1234567890, Regon 123456789,

XHUMANA NATHI
  • ngogesi nge-imeyili: adres@email.pl,
  • ngokubhala: < Igama le-ISP >, [Igama lomgwaqo 10, idolobha nekhowudi yeposi, njll.]
IZIMISO EZIKULE NQUZOMBOGOMO YOBUMFIHLO

Siqinisekisa ukuthi ukucubungula idatha yakho kwenziwa ngokuhambisana nemithetho ye-European Union (EU) Regulation 2016/679 yomhla ka 27 Ephreli 2016 (RODO), umthetho wokuvikela idatha yomuntu siqu, kanye neminye imithetho ekhethekile. Le Nqubomgomo yobumfihlo ilungiselelwe ngokuhambisana nayo yonke le mithetho. Sichaza ngokucacile indlela esiqoqa ngayo imininingwane yomuntu siqu futhi ngenhloso yokuyisebenzisa.

Qaphela ukuthi < Igama le-ISP > iqoqa idatha yomuntu siqu nolwazi lwezinkampani olunikelwa amakhasimende nabalingani bayo (okungenzeka) kanye nedatha etholakala ngesikhathi sokusebenzisa insiza ye-inthanethi.

UKUQOQWA KWEDATHA YOMUNTU SIQU

Siqoqa idatha yomuntu siqu enikezwa Abasebenzisi ngezikhathi ezilandelayo:

  • ukuthumela iziphakamiso, ukumisa imigomo yokusebenzisana noma ukuletha ulwazi mayelana nezinsiza nezinye izenzo < Igama le-ISP >,
  • ukusayina nokwenza izivumelwano nokugcina ukuxhumana nekhasimende/umlingani,
  • ukwenza imisebenzi edingeka ngumthetho,
  • ukuphendula imibuzo, ukubhekana nezikhalazo nokunikezela ngesevisi yangemva kokuthengisa,
  • ukumaketha okuqondile (okungafani new-newsletter),
  • ngenhloso yokugcina amarekhodi, ukufakazela, noma ukuqhubekisela phambili izimangalo.
UKUGCINWA NOKUSUSWA KWEDATHA

Ukuvikela ukuphepha kwedatha enikeziwe, sakha izinqubo zangaphakathi nezindlela zokuvimbela ukufinyelelwa okungagunyaziwe. Sisebenzisa izindlela zobuchwepheshe, ezivumelanayo, ezokuphatha nezangempela ukuvikela idatha. Silawula ukusebenza kwazo futhi sihlola ukuhambisana nemithetho efanele njalo.

Sigcina idatha yomuntu siqu yomsebenzisi kuphela isikhathi esidingekayo ukufeza izinhloso zokuyiqoqa.

UKWABELANA NOKWEMUKISA IDATHA

Asidayisi futhi asabelani nabantu besithathu ngemininingwane yomuntu siqu ngaphandle kwemvume yabo. Idatha yabantu ayihlelwa ukuze ihlaziywe ngokwezifiso.

Ngohlobo nobubanzi bokusebenzisana phakathi komsebenzisi ne < Igama le-ISP >, singadlulisa idatha yomsebenzisi uma kudingeka umthetho, noma uma kudingeka ukuhambisana nezenzo zomthetho noma ukufezekisa izibopho zenkontileka, ukuphendula izimangalo, noma ukuvikela amalungelo, impahla noma ukuphepha.

IZIMISO ZOKUCUBUNGULA IDATHA YAKHO

Sizama ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwentshisekelo yabantu idatha yabo icutshungulwa, ikakhulukazi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi idatha ilungile futhi ivikelekile ngokwezimiso ezilandelayo:

  • icutshungulwa ngokuhambisana nomthetho, ngokuthembeka nangobuqotho kumuntu idatha yakhe mayelana naye,
  • iqoqwe ngezinhloso ezicacile, ezinemvume yomthetho futhi ingasetshenziswa ngendlela engahambisani nalezo zinhloso,
  • ifanele, ifanele futhi incishisiwe kuphela kulokho okudingekayo ukufezekisa izinhloso zokucubungula,
  • ilungile futhi iguqulelwe lapho kudingeka. Senza izinyathelo ukuze idatha engalungile iqondiswe noma isuswe ngokushesha,
  • igcinwe ngendlela evumela ukuthi umuntu aqashelwe kuphela isikhathi esidingekayo ukufezekisa izinhloso zokucubungula,
  • icutshungulwa ngendlela eqinisekisa ukuphepha kwedatha, kuhlanganise ukuvikelwa ekufinyeleleni okungagunyaziwe, okungafanele noma ukulahleka ngokungahleliwe noma ukonakala.

Idatha yakho icutshungulwa ngokuvamile ngemvume, engakhanselwa nganoma yisiphi isikhathi. Kwezinye izimo, idatha yakho idingeka ukuze kwenziwe isivumelwano phakathi kwakho nathi noma ukwenza izenzo ngesicelo sakho ngaphambi kokusayina isivumelwano. Kwezinye izimo, idatha idingeka ukuze kugcwaliswe izibopho zomthetho ezisibophezelayo njengomphathi wedatha yomuntu siqu. Lokhu kufaka phakathi imithetho yomsebenzi noma umthetho wezincwadi. Ukucubungula kungase kudingeke nangokuthola izimfuno ezisemthethweni zentshisekelo yethu.

AMALUNGELO AKHO

Unamalungelo alandelayo:

  • Ukufinyelela okuqukethwe kwedatha yakho yomuntu siqu nokuthola ulwazi mayelana nezigaba zedatha, izinhloso zokucubungula, kanye nokuthola ikhophi yayo,
  • Ukulungisa okungalungile nokugcwalisa okushodayo, kanye nelungelo lokusulwa (ukuba ukhohlwe) uma idatha icutshungulwa ngokungekho emthethweni noma ingasadingeki,
  • Ukukhansela imvume yokucubungula idatha nganoma yisiphi isikhathi ngaphandle kokuthinta ukuhambisana nomthetho kwedatha ecubunguliwe ngaphambi kokukhanselwa kwemvume (uma icutshungulwa ngokusekelwe ku-Article 6(1)(a) noma 9(2)(a) ye-RODO).
AMACOOKIES

< Igama le-ISP >, isebenzisa amafayela e-cookie ukuze kube lula ukusebenzisa insiza. Ngokusebenzisa le nsiza uyavuma ukusetshenziswa kwamafayela e-cookie futhi uma ungawavimbi, uyavuma ukuthi agcinwe kudivayisi yakho.

IZINGUQUKO ENQUBOMBONDO YEDATHA YOMUNTU SIQU

< Igama le-ISP > igcine ilungelo lokushintsha inqubomgomo yobumfihlo njengoba ubuchwepheshe be-inthanethi buthuthuka, noma izinguquko zomthetho zokuvikela idatha zomuntu siqu, noma ukuthuthukiswa kwensiza yokufinyelela enikezwa umphathi. Ngazo zonke izinguquko sizokwazisa ngokusobala nangokucacile.

Yonke imibuzo mayelana nenqubomgomo yobumfihlo sicela uyithumele ku-imeyili: adres@email.pl
